title: Fireside with the Underboss - Missing And Presumed Dead
description: After the Castellano hit, Sammy had immediate plans to go on the lam. He takes us back to that time and gives tell is, in depth, what it felt like to leave his life and loved ones behind.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: After the Castellano hit, Sammy had immediate plans to go on the lam. He takes us back to that time and gives tell is, in depth, what it felt like to leave his life and loved ones behind.
